name: Time Transit VR
description: Step into the world as it was millions of years ago! Time Transit uses its cutting edge technology to send you back in time on an adventure of a lifetime. Navigate through mesmerizing landscapes from the depth of the oceans to the peaks of mountains. Experience wildlife from bygone ages close up.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 21 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 1080 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 21 GB available space
